list.comment: Fix issue #3 in flatten-boolean-op: Infinite loop during subtraction op - Edge::setOverlap() method : remove orientation check for arc, rely only on points equality

task.summary: Default task
- Ray shooting test & fix bugs - Added method contains to Polygon - Changed method box of Arc
- Add docs - Keep on testing
clean workspace
Split test by classes, add more tests for coverage
Add closest point to distance methods
Complete distance methods and move all to algorithms
clean workspace
Fix bugs in distance measurement algorithm
Add distance to polygon - naive approach, slow
Fix bugs, add more tests for better coverage

- Add new Distance shape2planarSet method based on interval trees - Updated point2shape methods to return [dist, shortest_segment] - Added new get vertices methods to Segment, Arc and Point (for viewer app)
- Fix technical bugs
- Fix technical bugs (2) - correct fix
Changes in Readme.md
Change in readme
Added Inversion class, not tested and not documented yet
Added spliFace method to polygon class
Rename splitFace to addVertex. Fix bugs and add tests
Added method setInclusion with some tests
Started Clip algorithm
- Added parameter "edges" to face.append, face.remove, face.insert methods - Edited documentation

Boolean operations test and fix (union) - Circle::toArc() method - end angle -pi instead of 3pi - Face::getRelation - initialize edges bv flags before recalcuation - Polygon::addVertex - no edges.update method in PlanarSet anymore, use delete and add - Ray shooting - skip vertex ip if between same edges and already counted - Ray shooting - fix technical bug in sorting - BooleanOp - clone both polygons in clip - calculate inclusion flags with original polygons for performance - consider face id when sorting intersection points - remove not relevant between points belong to same face
Move Boolean Operations to separate package
Support polygon serialization methods using JSON.stringify and JSON.parse
Remove bollean_op algorithm as moved to separate package
Added polygon.isValid() method (only sip check) and some tests Added translate() method to segment, arc and polygon Added box.svg() method
Add new Image class
Submit minified release version
Fixed technical bug in Face.getSelfIntersectionPoints
Changes in svg methods: strokeWidth default, add fillOpacity
Deploy minified release
Changes in svg() methods: remove option to transfer any attributes, leave only "id" and "className"
Submit minified build
- update edge arc length when insert into face - added test of edge in face iteration using iterator.next()
- fixed technical bug in previous commit
- added some basic methods to Vector class: add, subtract, angleTo, projectionOn plus new tests and updated documentation - fixed bug in line.incidentTo method
submit umd build
Fix issue 6 Missing variable declaration and instantiation in segment2line method
- Added new class Matrix to support affine transformation matrix - Added transform() methods for point, segment, arc and polygon - Updated documentation - Added some tests (need to add more)
Fix bug in polygon transformation methods
Fix bug in polygon transformation methods
- Continued with Typescript declarations file index.d.ts - Implemented missing method "clear" in PlanarSet - index.js - commented unnecessary constants
- Finished Typescript declarations file index.d.ts - Upgrade dependencies
- clean
Added and documented toJSON() method to all shape classes Reverted face.svg() method to return only path description string for "d" attribute
Fix issue #3 in flatten-boolean-op: Infinite loop during subtraction op - Edge::setOverlap() method : remove orientation check for arc, rely only on points equality

MESSAGE.value: Boolean operations test and fix (union) - Circle::toArc() method - end angle -pi instead of 3pi - Face::getRelation - initialize edges bv flags before recalcuation - Polygon::addVertex - no edges.update method in PlanarSet anymore, use delete and add - Ray shooting - skip vertex ip if between same edges and already counted - Ray shooting - fix technical bug in sorting - BooleanOp - clone both polygons in clip - calculate inclusion flags with original polygons for performance - consider face id when sorting intersection points - remove not relevant between points belong to same face
Move Boolean Operations to separate package
Support polygon serialization methods using JSON.stringify and JSON.parse
Remove bollean_op algorithm as moved to separate package
Added polygon.isValid() method (only sip check) and some tests Added translate() method to segment, arc and polygon Added box.svg() method
Add new Image class
Submit minified release version
Fixed technical bug in Face.getSelfIntersectionPoints
Changes in svg methods: strokeWidth default, add fillOpacity
Deploy minified release
Changes in svg() methods: remove option to transfer any attributes, leave only "id" and "className"
Submit minified build
- update edge arc length when insert into face - added test of edge in face iteration using iterator.next()
- fixed technical bug in previous commit
- added some basic methods to Vector class: add, subtract, angleTo, projectionOn plus new tests and updated documentation - fixed bug in line.incidentTo method
submit umd build
Fix issue 6 Missing variable declaration and instantiation in segment2line method
- Added new class Matrix to support affine transformation matrix - Added transform() methods for point, segment, arc and polygon - Updated documentation - Added some tests (need to add more)
Fix bug in polygon transformation methods

- Finished Typescript declarations file index.d.ts - Upgrade dependencies
- clean
Added and documented toJSON() method to all shape classes Reverted face.svg() method to return only path description string for "d" attribute
Fix issue #3 in flatten-boolean-op: Infinite loop during subtraction op - Edge::setOverlap() method : remove orientation check for arc, rely only on points equality
